Service Details: - Offers 2 central locations that provide eighteen short-term homes for women and women with children- Offers short term housing for a period of one month to one year- Residents receive many additional services from the Society during their residency including food, clothing, encouragement and support
Eligibility: Ages: 19 year(s) and upPlease visit the website for full eligibility details
How to Apply: - Applications are available at the office or may be downloaded from the website- Applications must be mailed in or dropped off at the office- Faxed applications will not be accepted
Address & Map: 2055 Benvoulin Crt, #101Kelowna, BC     V1W 2C7View MapQuest Map
